title: New PBE account disabed
body:
I just got a PBE account, I was very careful with that account. I didn't gave it to anyone, I played on it a lot, and I tested lot of things, like bugs and non-balanced things. This day, with the new skins, reworks and updates I tried to log in and I say my account disabled "temporary". I've read some other requests, but I didn't found an answer. What can I do to recover it? Please help me with this ticket. If it's possible, contact me at:

-snip-

replies.body: I've removed your personal info for privacy reasons.  Hit us up through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team can look into this with you directly!
